alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:29PM MST until January 14 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Northern Phillips, Southwest Phillips and Northern Valley Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips
